welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Johnston, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and immerse yourselves in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and lounges.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Central Airport provides services for travelers flying to and from international destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport is a modern and spacious facility, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: InterLink Terminal
terminals.description: The InterLink Terminal at T. F. Green Airport is a state-of-the-art transportation hub, providing easy access to trains, buses, and rental cars.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal at State Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal dedicated to handling cargo shipments at State Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for handling cargo and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
